1.title: Unexpected Guest
1.plot: A week after the death of Jonathan, Layla resurfaces for a reunion with the wine down Wednesday crew, put together by Jaimie in an effort to remember the life of Jonathan. One by one everyone must prepare to confront the issues they have with one another. Layla is caught off-guard when Michael arrives.

2.title: The Thick
2.plot: Layla and Michael go toe- to- toe about their unresolved issues. Layla questions Michaels Loyalty to Jonathan. Michael questions Layla's sudden disappearance, after their night together.

3.title: Memory Lane
3.plot: The tension amongst the group is high. Krystal tries to lighten the mood by asking everyone their fondest memories of Jonathan. What starts with good intentions, ends with high emotions and unsettled feuds.

4.title: Playing Games
4.plot: Jaimie confronts Michael about his absence from Jonathan's funeral. Michael reveals the truth about his relationship with his family. Alex and Whitney face their issues head on, leaving the entire group to step in. Michael makes a discovery.

5.title: The Hot Seat
5.plot: Whitney questions Jaimie's relationship with Krystal, which causes conflict between the couple. Layla's disappearance is center focus once more. During a heart to heart moment, Layla reveals a secret to Whitney.

6.title: On the outs
6.plot: A drunken Whitney begins to annoy Alex. Layla notices something strange is going on with Michael. A bothered Alex almost comes to blows with Whitney. With the group now watching, Whitney has a meltdown, revealing Layla's secret in the process. The group looks at Layla for answers.

7.title: Pathetic Measures
7.plot: Michael is furious to find out about his son. Layla and Whitney get physical. With all eyes on her, Layla finally confess. Filled with rage, Michael is interrupted by a mysterious text and leaves abruptly.

8.title: Wolves & Sheep
8.plot: Everyone is reeling from the events of the day. Michael returns to the apartment, angry and with new information about Jonathan's death. The group makes a shocking discovery.

9.title: Bonded
9.plot: As the night ends, the group's secret will bond them, forever.

imdb.plot outline: Six estranged friends come together in memorial of a mutual friend whose recent death has raised suspicion. Tensions are high when they are forced to face the conflicts that tore them apart. After years of separation old wounds are still unhealed as they try to celebrate the life of their noble friend who once was the glue that kept them all together. As they hash out their differences they are now left with one unresolved matter, what happened to Jonathan? In the end they find out that someone within this friendship circle isn't a friend at all.
imdb.title: Remembering Wednesday
plot: Six estranged friends come together in memorial of a mutual friend whose recent death has raised suspicion. Tensions are high when they are forced to face the conflicts that tore them apart. After years of separation old wounds are still unhealed as they try to celebrate the life of their noble friend who once was the glue that kept them all together. As they hash out their differences they are now left with one unresolved matter, what happened to Jonathan? In the end they find out that someone within this friendship circle isn't a friend at all.::Garrick Wade
